languages.text: "Благославен будь сей дух. Перед ним — великий путь и великое будущее. И нам надлежит помогать его шагам".
"Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."
languages.original_text: "Благославен будь сей дух. Перед ним — великий путь и великое будущее. И нам надлежит помогать его шагам".

traits.locale_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

languages.text: «Bendito sea este espíritu. Le esperan un largo camino y un grandioso futuro. Debemos ayudarle en su camino».
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: «Bendito sea este espíritu. Le esperan un largo camino y un grandioso futuro. Debemos ayudarle en su camino».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「この精霊に祝福あれ。この先に偉大な道と未来が待ち受けているだろう。そして、この精霊がその道を歩めるように私たちが手助けせねばならない」
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: 「この精霊に祝福あれ。この先に偉大な道と未来が待ち受けているだろう。そして、この精霊がその道を歩めるように私たちが手助けせねばならない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “祝福这个灵魂，伟大的道路与光明的未来正在它面前铺开。我们必须帮助它踏上属于它的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: “祝福这个灵魂，伟大的道路与光明的未来正在它面前铺开。我们必须帮助它踏上属于它的道路。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Loué soit cet esprit. Une voie et un avenir radieux s'ouvrent devant lui, et nous devons l'aider à poursuivre son chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit cet esprit. Une voie et un avenir radieux s'ouvrent devant lui, et nous devons l'aider à poursuivre son chemin. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Gesegnet sei dieser Geist. Ein großer Pfad und eine große Zukunft liegen vor ihm. Und wir müssen ihm auf seinem Weg helfen."
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: "Gesegnet sei dieser Geist. Ein großer Pfad und eine große Zukunft liegen vor ihm. Und wir müssen ihm auf seinem Weg helfen."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Bu ruh kutsaldır. Önünde yüce bir yol ve kutlu yarınlar yatmaktadır. Bizim de ona bu yolda destek olmamız gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Blessed be this spirit. A great path and a great future lie before it. And we must assist it on its way."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ruh kutsaldır. Önünde yüce bir yol ve kutlu yarınlar yatmaktadır. Bizim de ona bu yolda destek olmamız gerekir."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
